model.label: Client ID
model.description:
Important! Before adding Marketo Klips to your dashboard, you must configure important settings in your Marketo account first.

Enter Your LaunchPoint Client ID and Client Secret. Not sure where to find your Client ID and Client Secret? See Klip Gallery: Marketo.

model.label: REST API URL
model.description: Enter your REST API URL. This is the same as your Endpoint URL without '/rest'. Not sure where to find your Endpoint URL? See Klip Gallery: Marketo.
